casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jesus Rafael RODRIGUEZ. No. 379P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 15, 2015. Jesus Rafael Rodrigues, Spruce Pine, for Rodriguez, Jesus Rafael. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Robert S. Banks, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of November 2015 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed Ex Mero Motu by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of December 2015."
